Subject: Embroidery 101
Description: Come learn how to hand embroider! We will begin by learning some basic stitches and techniques, then you'll have plenty of time to practice what you learned. All materials will be provided. Please sign up at Ops.  Speakers include:Janet Gocay - Track: DIY  - Duration: 1 hour and 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: none

Subject: Homemade Soda
Description: Learn to make homemade soda with the conchair and head of programming! We will go over the basic technique for making flavored soda using juice and yeast. Plenty of samples will be provided!  Speakers include:Janet Gocay, Nuri Gocay - Track: Food  - Duration: 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: none

Subject: Opening Ceremonies
Description: Join our con chair, Nuri Gocay, the Con Committee, and our Guests of Honor as we open this bad boy up for the weekend.  You never know what surprises might be in store!  Speakers include:Janet Gocay, Scott Kennedy, Lucy Kennedy, Nuri Gocay, Cylithria Dubois, Amanda Long-Adams, Amanda Robinson, Christine Bender, Ed Mason, Vinny Rawlley, Erika Carlson, Eva Galperin, Ernie Cline, YTCracker - Track: Penguicon Events  - Duration: 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: Microphone, Sound System

Subject: Penguicon 2015 Planning Meeting
Description: Planning meeting with the 2015 ConChair. If you're interested in helping to organize next year's convention, come offer your soul, your firstborn child... or just your help.   Speakers include:Janet Gocay, Scott Kennedy, Lucy Kennedy, Nuri Gocay, Cylithria Dubois, Amanda Long-Adams, Amanda Robinson, Christine Bender - Track: Penguicon Events  - Duration: 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: none

Subject: Penguicon Party Planning for Detcon1
Description: Penguicon will be throwing a two-night room party at Detcon1. Come help with the plans for this most epic of parties!  Speakers include:Janet Gocay, Nuri Gocay, Scott Kennedy, Steve Gutterman - Track: Penguicon Events  - Duration: 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: none

Subject: Closing Ceremonies
Description: As we officially shut down another amazing, exciting year for Penguicon, come hear about how it went, and what we've got our eye on for next year.  Speakers include:Janet Gocay, Scott Kennedy, Lucy Kennedy, Nuri Gocay, Cylithria Dubois, Amanda Long-Adams, Amanda Robinson, Christine Bender, Ed Mason, Vinny Rawlley, Erika Carlson, Eva Galperin, Ernie Cline, YTCracker - Track: Penguicon Events  - Duration: 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: Microphone, Sound System

Subject: Developing Software for Penguicon
Description: Penguicon has begun to host hackathons year-round to develop software to help organize this convention: tuxtrax.org. Please join us at the whiteboard! Developers and interested stake holders will meet to discuss the project's purpose, stack, and next steps. Look at the user stories in the readme and the flowchart image in the wiki: https://github.com/MattArnold/penguicontrax  Speakers include:Matt Arnold, Bruce Webber, John D. Bell, Janet Gocay, Chad Crabtree, Jeff Quesnelle, Stan Carrico - Track: Tech  - Duration: 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: none
